title: Relocate tests fails on macOS

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
When I run `spack test` on macOS, the `relocate.py` tests always fail.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack test lib/spack/spack/test/relocate.py
...
FAIL lib/spack/spack/test/relocate.py::test_replace_prefix_bin
FAIL lib/spack/spack/test/relocate.py::test_relocate_elf_binaries_absolute_paths
FAIL lib/spack/spack/test/relocate.py::test_relocate_elf_binaries_relative_paths
FAIL lib/spack/spack/test/relocate.py::test_make_elf_binaries_relative
FAIL lib/spack/spack/test/relocate.py::test_relocate_text_bin
...
```

### Error Message

```
E                                  spack.util.executable.ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
E                                      '/usr/bin/gcc' '-Wl,--disable-new-dtags' '-Wl,-rpath=/usr/lib:/usr/lib64' '/private/var/folders/21/hwq39zyj4g36x6zjfyl5l8080000gn/T/pytest-of-Adam/pytest-41/test_replace_prefix_bin0/main.c' '-o' '/private/var/folders/21/hwq39zyj4g36x6zjfyl5l8080000gn/T/pytest-of-Adam/pytest-41/test_replace_prefix_bin0/main.x'

lib/spack/spack/util/executable.py:189: ProcessError
-------------------------------------------------------------------------- Captured stderr call --------------------------------------------------------------------------
ld: unknown option: --disable-new-dtags
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
```
The problem is that these tests assume that `/usr/bin/gcc` is actually GCC. On macOS, `/usr/bin/gcc` is actually a symlink to the Apple Clang compilers, which don't accept the `--disable-new-dtags` flag. We either need to check if `/usr/bin/gcc` is actually GCC, or disable the tests entirely on macOS.

I don't think this error is caught by our CI because we don't have patchelf installed. We should install that in our CI to catch these kind of bugs.

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.15.4-580-42a04f5d6c
* **Python:** 3.7.8
* **Platform:** darwin-catalina-ivybridge
